title: List of all Androidar   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidar   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ArcLayout
repoList.description: A very simple arc layout library for Android

repoList.name: processing-android
repoList.description: Processing mode and core library to create Android apps with Processing

repoList.name: ArtHook
repoList.description: Library for hooking on ART

repoList.name: Android-AR-Kit
repoList.description: An open source, Geographical based, Augmented Reality library

repoList.name: android-support-library-archive
repoList.description: Archive for every released revision of the support library, from Android [Discontinued in 2014]

repoList.name: arrow
repoList.description: Arrow is Lightweight library toolbox for Java and Android Development.

repoList.name: Android-Architecture-Components
repoList.description: The template project that uses Android Architecture Components with Repository pattern. The simple app that uses awesome Fuel library instead of Retrofit for perfoming HTTP request. The app also persists data using the Room library and display data in RecyclerView.

repoList.name: GithubArchitectureComponents
repoList.description: The implementation of Android "Architecture Components" sample explained by Google : https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/architecture/guide.html

repoList.name: article-android
repoList.description: Android library for displaying web articles in a readable format

repoList.name: Arduino-Library
repoList.description: A lightweight Android library to communicate with Arduino through usb.
